row.entry: To invoke corresponding methods of documents when changing document action.

Change DocAction for documents, i.e. Complete a Material Receipt WARNING! This web service complete documents not via workflow, so it jump over any approval step considered in document workflow. To complete documents using workflow it's better to use the runProcess web service
Run a process or report - if the process is a document workflow a document action can be configured
Get Reference Lists or Reference Tables
Web Service to create data following the persistence model of Adempiere
Web Service to create data following the persistence model of Adempiere, this is calling properly before/afterSave methods - and configured model validators.
Web Service to modify data following the persistence model of Adempiere
Web Service to modify data following the persistence model of Adempiere, this is calling properly before/afterSave methods - and configured model validators.
Web Service to delete data following the persistence model of Adempiere
Web Service to delete data following the persistence model of Adempiere, this is calling properly before/afterDelete methods - and configured model validators.
Access a record via its ID and return the corresponding data
Access records via conditions on columns - return data rows
